title: Analog Explorer | Planets – NASA Solar System Exploration
content: The Analog Explorer gallery shows field research sites on Earth side-by-side with similar environments on other worlds. Pairs like these are called planetary analogs. Research at analog locations on Earth helps scientists to make sense of our solar system. Science Writers: Phil Davis & Steve CarneySocial Media Lead: Bill DunfordDesign & Development: Moore Boeck Site last updated: May 15, 2023
